sentences.en: An unexpected error occured while manipulating the navigational structure of this Web.
sentences.cn: 操作此网站的导航结构时发生意外错误.

sentences.en: Chart correction has a direct effect on the navigational safety.
sentences.cn: 电子海图的改正直接影响到船舶航行安全.

sentences.en: Gyroscopes are used in navigational instruments for ships, aircraft, and spacecraft.
sentences.cn: 陀螺仪用于船舶 、 飞机和宇宙飞船中的导航设备.

sentences.en: In most cases, though, the use of tabs creates significant navigational excise.
sentences.cn: 不过, 在大多数情况下, 标签的使用也带来了相当大的导航附加工作.

sentences.en: It is forbidden to dump gravel and trash into navigational lanes.
sentences.cn: 第三十四条禁止向航道倾倒砂石和废弃物.

sentences.en: It'shall be forbidden to damage navigation aids or navigational facilities.
sentences.cn: 禁止损坏助航标志和导航设施.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, the security of the files beyond navigational structure must be addressed.
sentences.cn: 然而, 文件的安全必须优先于文件夹结构加以解决.

sentences.en: One of the core technologies of mobile robot is navigational technology.
sentences.cn: 移动机器人的核心技术之一是导航技术.

sentences.en: Pay attention to design values ( graphics, navigational strategies ) asas writing style.
sentences.cn: 请注意设计 ( 图像, 浏览策略 ) 以及写作风格同样重要.

sentences.en: Scientists actually know little about how animals perform their navigational feats.
sentences.cn: 科学家们对动物的这种导航绝技却是孤陋寡闻的.

sentences.en: The crash was a direct result of inadequate navigational aids.
sentences.cn: 坠机是导航不力的直接后果。

sentences.en: The difficulties in getting over mix with some tricky navigational choices.
sentences.cn: 在获得了一些棘手的选择组合导航的困难.

sentences.en: These virtual folders serve only as organizational and navigational aids.
sentences.cn: 这些虚拟文件夹仅仅起到组织和定位的作用.

sentences.en: We will consider this case again when we discuss the federal navigational servitude.
sentences.cn: 下文论述联邦通航使用权时,我们将重新考虑这一案例.

sentences.en: Zooming and panning are navigational tools for exploring 2 D and 3 D information.
sentences.cn: 缩放和平移是浏览二维和三维信息的导航工具.

words.tran_cn: 可航行的；可驾驶的；适于航行的
驾驶，操纵；使通过；航行于

trans.tran_en: Navigational means relating to the act of navigating a ship or an aircraft
